products.name: Redmi A2+
features: The Redmi A2+ is designed to perform all the essential tasks for you to stay connected, and productive!
Leather texture finish on Redmi A2+ makes the smartphone look super trendy and gives it a smudge-free feel
Redmi A2+ comes with a fingerprint sensor to securely unlock your smartphone
Enjoy smooth, lag free performance on the Redmi A2+ with the powerful octa-core MediaTek Helio G36 based on 12nm architecture

products.name: Redmi A2
features: The Redmi A2+ is designed to perform all the essential tasks for you to stay connected, and productive!
Unique leather pattern finish on the back of Redmi A2 not only provides a comfortable grip but also makes it a fashion statement
Powerful octa-core chipset based on 12nm process let's you do more of everything smoothly without any lags or hangs
With up to 7GB* RAM on Redmi A2, switch between multiple apps smoothly

products.name: Redmi 12C
features: The Redmi 12C is designed to perform all the essential tasks for you to stay connected, and productive!
Get the fast smartphone experience and multi-task in lag-free speeds with the powerful MediaTek Helio G85. This chipset brings the HyperEngine Technology for a superior gaming experience
Enjoy next - level smoothness with an additional 5GB virtual RAM extension on the 6GB RAM, delivering up to 11GB* extended RAM
Save your favorite photos, videos, games, music and more with up to 128GB storage on the Redmi 12C and a further expandable storage of up to 1TB with a micro-SD card

products.name: Redmi Note 12
features: At just 7.8mm of thickness, Redmi Note 12 packs uber stylish design in an ultra-thin body, making this the sleekest Note
Segment leading Super AMOLED Display coupled with a 120Hz refresh rate on the Redmi Note 12 deliversstunning, immersive viewing experience with super smooth visuals
Redmi Note 12 debuts with the latest SnapdragonÂ® 685. The super powerful octa-core chipset based on 6nm architecture delivers sustained power and performance
Get picture perfect shots with the 50MP camera setup on the Redmi Note 12

products.name: Redmi Note 12 Pro 5G
features: 50MP Sony IMX 766 Camera + OIS MediaTek Dimensity 1080 5G 120Hz Pro AMOLED Display 67W Turbo Charge
50MP Sony IMX766 Sensor Bring out the Pro-fessional photographer in you with the flagship IMX766 sensor
Blur free pictures with Optical Image Stabilisation
Capture stunning low light pictures with the flagship camera setup
Experience extraordinary visuals on the 120Hz Pro AMOLED Displaywith variable refresh rate which automatically switches to match the content on the screen

products.name: Redmi 11 Prime
features: A new-age design with a perfect hand grip. Smudge-free texture with a premium finish. Redmi 11 Prime is designed to make you stand out from the crowd.

Now play all games without a lag or latency. The Redmi 11 Prime powered by MediaTek Helio G99 enables smooth multi-tasking experience to switch between apps with the help of LPDDR4X RAM and UFS 2.2 helps higher data transfer speed.
Enjoy the wholesome multimedia experience on a 16.71cm (6.58) screen with Hi-Res Audio support, ensuring a theatre like experience on your smartphone.
Experience the smooth and fast display with 3 stage AdaptiveSync refresh rate for scrolling, gaming or juggling between the apps.
The Redmi 11 Prime comes with a 50MP AI triple camera. Now make that trending videos with a super clear camera. The 8MP front camera ensures you get that profile picture worthy selfies.

products.name: Redmi A1
features: The amazing A1 design with leather texture finish adds great grip, stylish looks & smudge free touch to the smartphone!
Redmi A1 comes with a massive HD+ Display supporting a 120Hz touch sampling rate bringing all that entertainment to your life
It packs a huge 5000mAh battery with a 10W charger in the box, now you do not have to worry about running out of charge. This also comes with OTG support
Powered by MediaTek Helio A22 along with high-speed LPDDR4X RAM, this smartphone is built for multi-tasking and power efficiency
Android 12 provides a clean Android experience that ensures rich connectivity and light AI to run faster and save data
